channel.title: Exoplanet Imaging Challenge
channel.description: Community-wide data challenge for high-contrast imaging data processing and the comparison of exoplanet direct detection algorithms

item.title: Test markdown
item.description: Each post also has a subtitle - You can write regular markdown here and Jekyll will automatically convert it to a nice webpage.
